snippet.title: Walkr - Galaxy Adventure in Your Pocket
snippet.description:
One small step for you. One light year for Walkr!
Download iOS: http://apple.co/1FfgXsi
Download Android: http://bit.ly/walkrgp
Walkr Ofiicial Website: http://walkrgame.com

Hop aboard the fantastic Walkr spaceship and start your adventure across the boundless cosmos. On a rocket built by an 11-year-old genius, you'll use your "walking energy" to fuel the ship, allowing you to discover more than 50 fascinating planets, like Caramel Apple, Octopus Cavern, Heart of Flames, and more! Throughout the universe, you'll also encounter delightful lost space creatures who will need your help along the way. It's truly the adventure you've been waiting for!

= FEATURES =
- FREE TO PLAY
- Build your own galaxy and devise new ways to increase your galaxy's population
- Explore the ever-expanding, boundless universe
- Undertake missions help the many adorable creatures across the galaxy find their homes
- Visit and say hello to your friends' galaxies
- Grow with Walkr: earn over 50+ awesome achievements and show off your collections.

= TURN EVERY STEP INTO ENERGY =
- Just put iPhone in your pocket, and Walkr will automatically record the number of steps you've taken and convert them into "walking energy" for storage.
- Walkr tracks and records your daily calorie consumption and recommends the appropriate daily exercise goals for you

Optimized for M7 in iPhone 5S
- Walkr use the M7 to record your movement accurately with minimal battery consumption

Have any problems or any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at service@fourdesire.com 

Find us on http://facebook.com/Fourdesire.inc
Visit us at http://walkrgame.com

Privacy Policy and Term of Service:
http://www.walkrgame.com/terms
